inn1.comm: a show of intent, off the mark immediately by pushing a wideish shortish one - let's call it a loosener of a half-volley - through the covers on the up, eavding a sliding Uthappa
lovely rhythmic run-up for Munaf, you want to sway with him, and he rips one past the outside edge, the last-second curl taking it just wide of the bat as the batsman pushes forward
good judgement there from Dilshan who shoulders arms as the ball licks past him on the up, and not so far above the sticks
edged and gone! Again Munaf plumbs the channel, just outside off this time and Dilshan prods forward, the ball curling out and catching faintly the outside edge with a sigh
short and defended on the back foot in line with just outside off stump
on leg, clipped down tidily and out to mid-on, where they shuffle through
starts well with one which bends across the left hander who shoulders arms as it's a decent length ball and to play at it could risk an edge
gets some fair lift from a regulation ball outside off, again it's left alone
Ishant would have thought that ball was fine enough, but the batsman dabs forward, somehow squeezing out the room and pushes a quick single through to mid-off. Cheeky
plenty of movement from outside leg to middle, Jayasuriya pops down a back-foot defence to gully and sends Sangakkara back
banged in outside off, good length, played down off the back foot and Sangakkara sends him back now
pushed across the left hander again who is quietened into defending
right up there and defended on the back foot
defended on the front foot now

overpitched and umpire Parker doesn't need a second opinion as his finger rises to give out Jayasuriya at the non-striker's end who can't get back in time as Sangakkara's straight drive is fingertipped on by Munaf who was trying to stop the runs rather than anything
the ball doesn't get up so high in line with middle but Jayawardene is quick in defence
on off and middle, rises up and is played back down with a defensive but the batsman was looking for some kind of run
defended tightly on the back foot
drinve forward for a quick single
beats the bat outside off, a touch of a false shot there
plays inside the line, drawing his bat in safely, like shutting the curtains from the outside world, as he realises the ball's a decent one that would have threatened his edge on the back foot
pushed past him, the ball cutting off the seam past him, and he leaves the ball
pushed across him again, the batsman waits on the back foot and defends down with a ramrod straight bat
again lets that go across him
good delivery, shoulders arms, it's quite hard for these two to be attacking just now as they're int he rebuilding stage, not to mention the tight bowling
pushes through on off, this one's defended on the back foot
more defence
another disciplined ball through outside off, once again left alone
down the channel, again lets it go through at 137.5kph
defends on the back foot and his figures continue to glow
pushed down on a good length and again gets that nagging rise forcing Sangakkara to defend back down
pushed across him and this time he shoulders arms. So much shouldering so far we need a new phrase for it
outside off, defended back down off the back foot and they look for the single, but decide against it
short and steered down off the back foot out towards square and the batsmen gratefully run through for a single
nipped back in from outside off, defended back down
bent in from outside off, the batsman leaps on to the length and pushes out a single to the leg side, stealing the strike to boot
outside off, pushed on to the back foot and drives out towards mid-off
very tight again, defended tightly also
let that one through with plenty of awkward bounce even if it's not bouncer-like, a touch of movement away
left alone a good-length delivery to the keeper
on middle and veering slightly to leg, but a cramping room means only a forward defensive prod
short outside off, Jayawardene hardly controls it down wide of the slips off the back foot, but brings up the double figures for the team, and a misfield allows them the second
pinged down at 142kph, defended down
some room outside off and Sangakkara latches on with a classy back-foot cover drive of a push that bissects the fielders and travels on
short, straight, and misses out on a pull, just too late onto the shot and the ball goes straight to the fielder
banged in at 137.7kph this time, defended on the back foot now
tight line, defended on the back foot out towards the other Kumar, ie Praveen, at mid-on
not too much the batsman can do with that either, other than lever arms as it goes through
stands on the back foot and waits for the ball before it's defended
waits for the ball which comes across him from over the wicket and gives it the chimney sweep
across him, good-length delivery defended on the front foot
a tad fuller and wide at 135.6kph, and reaches away from his body to drive square where there's a grasp at point and then Gambhir chases hard, albeit in vain
across him again, tighter line now and defended on the front foot
rise down the channel, wide enough to leave which is wise on a good length
defended on the front foot
pushed through at 145.2kph
outside off, worked into midwicket this time with a pull which finds the fielder
defended down off the back foot
slower ball, right up there in front of the toes although not quite a yorker, Jayawardene comes out and defends on the front foot
outside-edged with some control wide of the slips
a very wide down off signalled by Umpire Parker
down leg and Irfan Pathan not finding the same control as his colleagues, this one whipped off the hips through the vacant long leg
drags it wide of off stump again
pushed fairly wide again down off, left alone
pushed up there on leg, flicked behind square off the pads, literally - a half-appeal but it pitched outside leg
outside off, some curl away from the left hander, who defends into the covers off the back foot
outside off, more testing shape away from the left hander who gives it the willow salute, to use Tito's phrase
bustles into the crease, a curling arm swirl and touch of away swing and prompts the forward defence
a touch of width outside off, defended off the back foot into the covers
pitched back in from outside off and they sneak the single into the covers
stands over and sniffs the ball before rejecting it as it hustles through on a good length
staying over by the way, pushed past the left hander who leaves it alone
outside off and Praveen finds the outside edge but it travels past the slip and on its way
outside off, not too much length, but the batsman opens the face and guides past the slips on the back foot
tucked up on off and defended this time
turned off the legs behind square, manufacturing a scroing zone there as he takes the ball from off stump and pushes it on
starts comfortably outside off and bends away wider down off
outside off, a touch short, and Sangakkara rises and drives off the back foot straight to the man at cover
outside off again, a touch of curl away from the left hander who waits and defends on the back foot
outside off and cut-punched hard square through point, neat connection
good length again in line with off, the batsman jumps behind the ball and defends back down
a good delivery there, with a half-shout from Dhoni as it's wristed through well, hits the seam and moves away, nearly taking the outside edge from a forward push
too wide and you can't bowl there to him, Sangakkara crouches over and cuts well through point, leaning over and in to it
short ball on off, defended on the back foot straight back forward

on off, shuffled down off the back foot for a quick single, flicked on at the non-striker's end by Yuvraj who doesn't dislodge the bail for a while, enough room for a diving Sangakkara to get back in his crease
outside off and Sangakkara timed so well off the back foot to a diving Rohit Sharma in the gully
curls wide outside off and indeed it's given wide
plugs the line outside off again, but it's full enough to leave
curled around again, defended on the front foot
outside off, left alone through to the keeper
wide outside off at 135kph, cut hard to point but it's tidied up
but that was a decent delivery indeed, at 138kph, zooming past the squared-up batsman's outside edge
left alone outside off to a decent delivery
pushed him on to the back foot in front of off, pushed down into the off-side and they run through
on middle and off and with some movement at 132.4kph, pushed into the leg-side
round the wicket, starts wide and brings the ball back in from outside off
outside off but wide enough for Sangakkara to wait and flick a fashionably late cut through gully
outside off, wide, and Jayawardene waits before languidly cutting hard to point where Rohit Sharma makes a flashing stop
outside off, good line, pushed back down into the covers
outside off, enough shortness ont he ball for it to be worked back through gully off the back foot
a fair line across the left hander who shoulders arms
on off and middle, pushed into the off-side off the back foot
right up there on off, a hint of swing back into the batsman, enough shape for him to play it carefully
on middle and leg, wristed and wrested into the leg-side in front of midwicket
comes outside the line to flick the ball back down, not the most convincing shot, out to leg and that brings the fifty up
heart-in-mouth moment as the ball pitches outside off, licks in off the seam to the bat who presses through too quickly
nips back in and pushed back out to mid-off for a well-judged single
pushed down the off-side and it's left alone
nipped back in from outside off and pushed out to square off the back foot
moved in from outside off, and dabbed down off the back foot to gully
outside off, inside edged into the leg-side after he tried to drive out to the covers
moved back in from outside off, and pushed into the covers for another good single
glides the ball past the left hander who leaves it on the way through, the ball rising encouragingly off this hard deck
right up there on off, driven out to mid-on
shorter ball outside off, cut down through the gully, the batsman getting right over the top of the low bounce and easing it out
outside off, a touch short, driven out through the covers and it's tidied up inside the rope
outside off, driven straight through mid-off
banged in short, good show off aggression, the batsman just leaving it
outside off, played down to gully off the back foot with a controlled steer
down leg, swivelled round behind square with some good timing
outside off, played down into the gully, they look for the single but it's not on
on leg, pulls it down a touch short, and swivel-pulls it through square
outside off, cut into the covers on the front foot
only a touch short outside off, some banana-like swing round, the batsman leaving it
outside off, pushed down off the back foot towards the gully and they run through a well-taken single
on middle and leg, short, and pulled up high behind the keeper with a top edge that has Munaf with his hands on hips as it lands in space but is picked up inside the rope
outside off, holds the face of the bat almost like a shield away from the body, the ball rolling into the covers
outside off, overpitched and Sangakkara leans fully into a smooth cover drive
plenty of loop right up there, the ball pitching full on off, defended forward
up there again and squeezed out on the front foot towards midwicket
full delivery on leg, paddle-swept round to fine leg
testing delivery pitches outside off and comes back into the right hander who nearly pops the ball up on off
turned into short midwicket this time
right up there on off, good loop and drift, the batsman gets over the ball and defends
wide and flicked out a touch uppishly off the back foot through towards third man
outside off, width, and ccracked through point but the sweeper doesn't let them have the second with some quick returning work in the deep
tidy ball on middle and off, defensively brushed back down onto the track in front of him
well bowled, up there, and pushed out to mid-off
on off, turned back with an eased clip to midwicket
outside off, played down behind point for an easy single
pushed across the left hander from over the wicket, who cuts straight into the ground, no run
down the track, turned it out to midwicket
big loop on to off, the batsman gets down on one knee and sweeps round through midwicket
just outside off, pushed down behind point
pushed right up there on off, no room to manoeuvre anything other than a forward defensive
dragged down on off and Jayawardene makes no mistake, coming out and sweeping hard through backward square
width outside off, cut hard behind point
outside off again, wide again, and driven out to the covers to rotate the strike again
bangs it down a touch short, cut hard to point now who takes it cleanly
a better line, driven on the front foot back to the bowler who stops it with one hand
too wide outside off, cut hard to point again where it's easily picked up
overpitches on leg, driven out hard square
lets that one go through from around the wicket, good turn and bounce too
comes outside off and sweeps round through the 45
pushed him on to the back foot, and defended back down
outside off, played down off the back foot again, this time with a push out to the covers
extra loop, comes out and pushes to midwicket
width outside off, waits and cuts out to the covers
outside off and cut hard out to deep point
on off and pushed down off the back foot into the covers
slower delivert at 116.1kph, cut hard to point, the bowler getting away with the width
on off, driven to the covers
outside off, very well placed through third man with a late delicate cut
outside off and played with a controlled thick edge through third man
on off, pushed into short midwicket to bring up a responsible fifty and Sri Lanka's hundred
outside off, pushed on the front foot defensively
width outside off, cut out to deep point
right up there on off, dug out into the pitch, just on leg
turned into the left hander who waits and defends on the front foot
down on one knee, good deception from Harbhajan beats the bat
outside off, dabbed well through third man with ease, a graceful wristy late cut takes him closer to his own half-century
outside off, cut hard behind point for a safe single
right up there on middle and leg, pressed back out past the bowler and the mid-off cuts it off
on middle and leg, turned into the leg-side in front of midwicket
slower delivery at 112.3kph, played square to point, gently, off the back foot
short and hooked round through leg to bring up a well-worked fifty
width outside off, cut to point for an easy single
right up there on off and middle, defended on the front foot
loop on off, pushed into the covers defensively
on middle, a vain cry of "Catch it" as Sangakkara sweeps on the bounce to Ghambhir at deep square
opens the face and runs it out to gully off the back foot
right up there on off, defended on the front foot
drags down on leg, worked out to square and Sangakkara turned aggressively but Tendulkar doesn't let him have the second
drags it short and pulled round out to deep square where it's winged back in
on off and middle and tucked away to midwicket
at 131kph, driven out to mid-off
a no-ball for height and Sangakkara, batting out of his crease,  goes to fend it up to short midwicket where it's caught but not out
rushed off the legs to deep midwicket for an easy single
full in front of the toes, not quite a yorker, on off and driven out to the covers
up there and driven out to the covers this time
too full on the legs, pushed off to short midwicket
comes way over on off and flicks it back cleverly through fine leg with a sweep, good improvisation there
pushes him back into the crease and towards the leg, defends out on the back foot to the covers
good ball, saw him coming across off stump, so went a bit wider and the ball straightened on through
comes forward and flicks one up on the off-side
starts round the wicket steering it in full on the legs, where it's pushed to short midwicket
outside off, pushed to short midwicket on the front foot
follows him outside off, the batsman scrambles the ball out in front of square
just pushed it too far this time
driven out through the covers now
pushes this down off and Sangakkara comes down the track and scoops it high and safe in front of deep midwicket, but there weren't as many runs on as they would have thought
shapes back to wrist it out to the covers and doesn't quite get hold of it
played off the back foot to point
bent up there on off and defended on the front foot
driven out forward
turned off the legs to square
driven out to the covers this time
pushed on to the legs, turned out square
outside off, cut hard up and over, but safe, down to wide third man
on middle, tried to pull hard to midwicket but failed to connect
pushed across the left hander and driven out to mid-off
outside off, pulled high and hard over midwicket for the first six of the game
outside off, cut back in, defended on the back foot
pushed up there on off, and squeezed off the legs in the end through to midwicket
hmm, a textbookless shot that one, coming down outside off and trying to pull from way outside off, gets the top edge and it jumps over the frustrated Dhoni's head
outside off and this time connects fully with a sweep shot through midwicket for his first boundary for 21 overs, picked the gap well there
outside off, tucked into midwicket for a quick single
outside off, driven out wide of mid-on this time
outside off, driven in front of midwicket for an easy two
pushed out to the covers
cuts it back in from outside off, the ball leaping over the off stump, beating Jayawardene who breaks into an immediate smile, nods, and says "Good ball"
pushed to mid-off for a quick single and they set off immediately to bring up the 150
down the track and lashes hard through mid-off for a forthright four
on middle and turned off the legs down to fine
a good-length ball and Jayawardene backs way away, trying to smash way over cover but is too far back to connect
jags back in again and pushed out to the covers, no run this time
sees him coming down and out and follows him, the batsman turning it down short and fine to bring up the 150 partnership
outside off and clipped well through the deep 45 and they come back for two
outside off, cut hard to point
India strike at long last, Jayawardene failing to get back into his crease at the non-striker's end as the bowler got a fingertip on it
on leg, turned off the legs down to fine
turned off the legs into midwicket and is off the mark
defended on the front foot
nasty delivery on off and the extra bounce surprises the new batsman who fends it back down somehow
turns back in from outside off, left alone though
a direct hit from Rohit Sharma, who has fielded well today, runs him out at the non-striker's end after they aimed for the single following a push to point
outside off, pushed into the covers off the back foot
full up there on off, driven back out to mid-on
pulls it down a touch too short, but gets away with it as the batsman cuts to the man at cover
drags it again and cut hard out to deep point where it's picked up after a chase round
down leg and just to say a wide
short ball, pushed down off the back foot to gully
outside off, pushed back into the ground on off
dragged down outside off, cut into the covers again
outside off, driven out to mid-off
outside off, pushed down off the back foot into the covers
on middle, turned off the legs to short midwicket
started from outside leg at 138kph, turned into midwicket
outside off, run down through gully
right up there at 136kph, played forward defensively
pushed in on off, good length, tapped back out to the off-side
defended on the front foot
on the legs, turned back round behind square
outside off, carved hard through the covers
pushed across the right hander from over the wicket, a single's squeezed into the off-side
pushed on to the legs and turned through midwicket
on middle, turned to leg, picked up by Pathan who turns and shies, although he misses it was a good reaction
up there on off, pushed out to mid-on
wide full toss and deserved to be spanked for four, the batsman obliging by reaching out away from his body, the fielder's dive can't help
down leg and that's some nimble work from Sangakkara who whips it wristily back past the keeper through fine
on off and middle, pushed out in front of midwicket
a single pushed out square now
right up there in the blockhole, dug out
pushed forward
defended on the front foot
tried to play it out but didn't get hold of it away from the body
another play and miss with a touch of reverse
outside off, lashed hard through backward point off the back foot
outside off, played to the off-side
a play and a miss away from the body
on off, turned off the legs to midwicket and a direct hit of the single stump could have been very close indeed
taken from outside off and worked in front of midwicket
outside off, pulled round to the deep where the fielder comes in from the rope
backs away on middle to drive back out to long-off
taken from outside off, pulled to midwicket where it's stopped dead in its tracks
slower ball, picked, and pulled away into the deep
down leg, turned down fine off the pads
outside off, down the track and launched right over long-on for his third ODI century against India
wide and over long-off, Tendulkar sets off in pursuit
outside off, full delivery, driven out through the covers
backs away, followed outside leg, driven back out straight through long-on
outside off, comes out there and places well with a sweep round through fine to bring up his ninth boundary
backs way behind the stumps, giving himself room, and drives out to the covers
comes out and drives through to deep midwicket, trying to seek out the boundary
deliberately angles at the legs, swept short to fine
outside off, cut hard to point this time
outside off, has a swing and a miss outside off
low full toss driven out wide to the man around long-on
another one and this gets the treatment, in front of midwicket, the bowler not quite getting it in the blockhole and pays the price
a sweep into the deep this time
big shout for lbw and Dhoni's not happy that was turned down, but it looks to have been going down leg
gives himself a bit of room, backing away and driving out to mid-off
on off, cuts hard to point
outside off, whips the ball over to mid-on, they squeeze the single and the throw in is not well directed but it's picked up
on off, pulled over in front of midwicket
outside off, pulls the ball to mid-off (yes, pulls) and they grab the single
comes right outside off and looks to flick it back behind him but is deceived by the good change of pace, the ball nearly coming back and taking off stump
repeats the shot, coming outside off, but is better set this time and the flick round goes past Tendulkar
outside off, pulled high over to deep midwicket and Sangakkara finally falls for a magnificent century which has given Sri Lanka an excellent platform
good ball, in the block hole on leg, pushed out with a dig really
another full delivery, dug out again and it's enough for them to gain a quick single
outside off launched high over to long-on where Uthappa takes a straightforward catch a few yards in from the rope
full toss low on middle and leg, boomed out to deep midwicket but doesn't quite connect; it looked like it was travelling much harder
way outside off, crashed into the ground with a cut and they run through the single
outside off, another full delivery, dug only in front of him and they scramble through eluding Dhoni's last-gasp underarm

inn2.comm: starts well, forcing the defensive and the verdict is "Oh yes, good areas, Vaasy, yes Vaasy" apparently
defended on the front foot now
more defence
turned off the legs to get off the mark in what's going to be a challenging chase, but only a single as they decide not to go for two
turned off the legs to square
pushed through at a good lick and threatens the outside edge as the batsman prods forward
scorching outswinger at 144.3kph and Tendulkar goes for a duck, squared up and knocked back the top of off
off the mark straight away with a tuck off the legs somehow keeping a full delivery on middle out - and got the runs, too
swing away, defended down off the back foot
pitched away again on off, rising delivery, defended back down
oh, dropped, coming to him around 145kph-mark, squared up again on the back foot, Sangakkara got a glove tip on it with a full-stretched dive to his right
outside off, waits for it in line with off, and chops back down towards gully
up there on off, defended back down into the covers
up there on off, rises on to the back foot to defend back down
only middle, up there and defended back down off the back foot
curved away from the right hander who pushes forward of point
pushed past him outside off, the batsman levering arms
right up there on off, defended on the front foot
pushed up on off and defended on the back foot now
waits on the back foot in front of off and pushes through to mid-on where Amerasinghe runs round and stabs at the ball with his foot
straight bouncer, ducked under a touch
pushed past the outside edge, trapping him in his crease down off, as he goes for a huge waft of a cut
on leg, turned off the hips to fine
on off, short, and defended back down off the back foot
comes out and defends on the front foot as the ball goes across him
turned off the legs to square and well returned
hastened through almost before the batsman was ready and defended on the front foot
pushed into the covers
outside off, launched into a full-blooded cover drive, picking the gap. Great shot that one
right up there on leg, turned out to short midwicket
outside off, tries to cut out at it, chops into the ground instead
worked out off the legs to midwicket
defended off the back foot into the covers now
a booming wide from what would have been the slower ball at 116kph
worked off the back foot into the covers
on middle and leg and turned off the legs taking on Amerasinghe's arm, a good decision as it happened as they wre well back and Sangakkara had to go wide to receive it
on off and middle, played off the back foot to short midwicket
on off, driven back straight, Vaas got a touch on it when Uthappa was out at the non-striker's and it would have been close had the finger not deflected it too far wide
on off, rises off the back foot to dink into the covers
right up there on off, defended on the back foot
good length and a touch of swing coming back into the right hander who looks to work over it to short midwicket
pushed across the righthander outside off who moves into the line on off and defends back down off the back foot
more inswing and comes back in, defended on the front foot
played well through point
outside off, pushed across the batsman who lets it go through
crashed to short backward point and Dilshan dives well forward to stop it
outside off, pushed down off the back foot towards the gully where Silva does the fielding
pushed across the left hander who waits and drives out to point
a tight one in line with off, the batsman defends quietly on the front foot
worked across him, he waits and opens the face to steer the ball out to gully
fullish delivery on off, worked outr to short midwicket
on the legs and turned out to backward square for a single

outside off, hangs out the bat away from him, possibly on a clothesline maybe on a coathanger, and was in two-man's land, as Kenny Barrington would say as he was caught between playing and leaving, and in the end he was beaten for pace (it was a slower ball) so it was just as well
defended on the front foot this time
and yet again more front-foot defence
speared across the left hander who leaves it on a good length
down the track and turns it well off the legs to long leg
short on off, a quick one and then there's an overthrow which Malinga does not back up at mid-off
clipped down off the legs to short square
short on off and tucked into the leg-side this time
banged in short, a quick single to mid-off and Jayasuriya threw in a direct hit and Sri Lanka think they have their man, and indeed they do
right up there on middle and off, defended back down tidily
pushed him on to the back foot and one of the inner ring on off runs in to pick it up
outside off, the batsman leans over a decent shot of a cover drive but straight to the fielder
strides outside off where an outside edge pings between the slip and gully in plenty of space
straight on middle, defended on the front foot
wobbled in the air away from the batsman on off, who reaches out to defend
tight ball on off, another mix-up as Amerasinghe picks it up, shies, and needs Malinga to be backing up
on leg, rising delivery, brushed back down into square
comes forward and defends back down to gully
down leg, a big appeal for a strangle through to Sangakkara and Umpire Hill waits, considers, and finally raises the finger
pushed across him with a hint of nip away, squared into it and defended down to gully
on the legs, too short, and turned easily off the legs through midwicket
fired across the right hander who drives out to the covers
outside off, cut hard to the covers off the back foot
nipped back in from outside off, quietening him up and he defends back down the line
right up there on middle, good change of pace at 119.8kph, and it's as much as the batsman can do to play on the front foot
on off, a flicked pull shot through leg
on middle and off, driven on the up to mid-on
bagned in short, some rise on off, played off the back foot to the covers
outside off, rising again, and played off the back foot to the covers, stopping on the shot
plugging that line, inside-edged back on to his pads, the ball running out again into the covers and they run through
pushed across the left hander from over the wicket, defended back into the ground in line with off
down the legs and there's a huge appeal for a big noise as they looked for the strangle down... and in the end it's given wide
worked into short midwicket now
outside off, cut well into point with a flamboyant leg movement and there's an appeal for the run out with the second run. No third umpire was called for and he was well in
flings this one down off and Yuvraj is quick to leave it alone as it's on a good length
down off, short, and defended well back down
outside off, inside edges back into his pads, but looks for the single
again a leave this time
on the legs, clipped up to square
short ball on middle this time helped round the corner but didn't really get hold of it
that's a tight one and defended down well
waits outside off and defends down off the back foot
came back in at the right hander, who worked back and tucked out to short midwicket
outside off, cut hard off the back foot on the up to point
slanted past him and he waited on the back foot to defend down without issue
on the legs and there's a shot and a half, Yuvraj generating immense power with some consummate timing off the legs
pushed on the back foot with a steer out to point
outside off, waited on the back foot and pushed to point
landed on a dime on middle and off, worked off the back foot into the covers
stands and waits to meet the ball which greets him full on off and is driven out to cover
a very wide outside off
comes across him and is defended down off the back foot
pushes him on to the back foot in front of off, defended forward
on leg, turned behind square for a comfortable single
outside off, pushed back into the ground with no fuss
outside off, too short, and whipped hard with tremendous power through midwicket
pushed across the left hander, on a good length, who waits and defends back down
npiped off the seam and played on the up through straight mid-off
on off and middle, rising, and turned into short midwicket
dangled one in outside off, the batsman drives it into the covers off the back foot
short outside off and pulled round with a pure lash in front of midwicket
pushed up there on off, tidied into the covers
veering towards middle and leg and turned quickly into short midwicket, the ball stunned which prevented the fielder getting to it in time to be a threat
a better length, and good line on off, defended back down
outside off, driven hard through the covers and how the crowd loved that four
turned off the legs behind square for a comfortable single
right up there on off, the batsman comes forward and defends crushingly on the front foot
down the track and Yuvraj's back leg flamingoes up as he drives on the front foot audaciously through mid-off, turning the ball into a half-volley
digs out a push to the covers
a quicker one this time tightens him up and cramps him into defending down
a pretty wide down leg
short on leg and pulled high wide of deep midwicket, just wide that is and that was a top edge too. A smiling Murali rolls his eyes and shrugs
in on off, driven out to long-on and can't quite be cut off at mid-on, the batsmen coming back for two
driven out through the covers, the runs flowing now
over the bat outside off this time
half-volley outside off and this is a glorious shot by Yuvraj, leaning hard into and shooting it through cover with both power and timing
right up there on off, tucked slowly out to mid-off, the batsmen running through too. Good cricket
tidy delivery to end, defended on the front foot
bent across the batsman who plays a false sweep, the ball going one way, the bat completely the opposite direction
waits for the ball on off and defends on the front foot
right up there on middle, swept round to the 45 where there's a man waiting
turned away from the left hander who was quick to push it back out to the leg-side again
an appeal for the stumping and possibly the outside edge to a defensive prod forward, neither were out though - no bat and the foot was back behind the line
down leg and swept out backward of square
outside off, pushed to the covers on the back foot
outside off, cut down through third man with a delicate sneak, a good arm in the deep, as well
up there on off, driven back out straight
straightens behind the ball and works it out square, the ball hitting the pads first
outside off, turned it down through third man
good bowling out of the rough, Yuvraj rushes a quick drive to mid-on
wide outside off, caressed with a push off the back foot to point
outside off swept up hard to deep midwicket and  though he hit that hard and flat it was straight to Silva and a delighted Murali claps his hands
a huge shout first up as Dhoni's rapped in line with middle but was well forward. Murali drifted that one in front round the wicket
squeezes out two through backward point and India's hundred is now up
turns back in from middle, hitting leg, and the ball pops up
turned back from off this time, tries to work into short midwicket but can't get hold of it
up there on off, played forward on the front foot
defended this time
on off, swept round through square
on off, driven out wide of mid-off
outside off, and a sweep shot travels all the way over midwicket
comes out and drives hard to long-off
pushed on to the back foot in front of off, plenty of spin and bounce
pushed at it hard with quick ahnds and very strong wrists
driven out to the covers and return throw spits up at Murali who just avoids a nasty blow
pushed across the left hander with a touch of width, he cuts hard square to bring up his fifty and what a relieved man he will be
meets the ball on leg and pushes out to midwicket
big loop on off and driven wide of mid-on for an easy two
driven out squareish, in front of pointt
down leg, turned really fine but not quite wide enough to hit the helmet behind Sangakkara for the five bonus runs
outside off, cut hard behind point
jogged a single through after easing to point
slings in the straight bouncer and sways away
comes out and pushes into the covers this time
lets that one go outside off
a quick single
dip and zip past the outside edge, smashing doosra
and again the doosra, only this time he nearly has his man as he finds the outside edge which pitches in front of first slip
on the legs, driven out to midwicket and they run through for the easy single
driven forward
ooh, the ball surprised him, getting on to the bat quicker than he was expecting but didn't pop up dangerously, driven out instead to mid-off
outside off, pushed hard behind point for an easy single
outside off, chopped down hard on it to point
outside off, pushed out to mid-off
stands on the back foot and drives hard to the covers
on the legs turned back to short fine leg
outside off, driven out to deep extra cover and takes the single...then a misfield
pushes it past the outside edge
goes for the drive outside off, pushed up
quietens him up in line with leg, pushed back out to midwicket
swivelled in on leg, it was on him quicker than expected and he pushed to short midwicket
on off and middle, turned round behind square
turned out from the left hander who gets bat on it towards point
banged in short and driven out to deep cover
on off, rising from a good length, and defended back down off the back foot
outside off, drives into the covers
outside off, overpitched and hello, that's a great shot, coming down for an aerial drive over cover, beating the ring
worked into the off-side this time
up there on middle, good running and Malinga misfields at deep extra cover, allowing the second
pitches outside off and turns away wider, the batsman drives out through the covers
backs away and the bowler follows him, the ball popped up towards the covers but safe
outside off, cut hard behind point for a ball which travels and brings up the 150
outside off, driven hard through the covers off the back foot, launched into that shot
outside off and worked down through third man, just opening the face
stands tall and pushes off the back foot through to mid-on
dabbed for a quick single
outside off, driven into the leg-side
right up there on off and pushed into the covers
outside off, extra climb on the ball, cut to point
outside off and worked into the covers
well now, that is a comprehensive yorker and a half, cleaning up his middle stump and Yuvraj crashes his bat down just too late
up there on off, and worked off the back foot into the covers
defended again
width outside off and driven into the covers
slower delivery at 116kph in front of off, driven out to the covers
stands tall and lets the ball go through on a good length outside off
outside off, the batsman comes over and leans into a cover drive
banged across the right hander who drives into the covers on the back foot
edged past the keeper, the ball coming across him, and the ball runs on as there's no slip in
outside off, pushed into the covers
fired in at 131kph, tight delivery, pushed back to the off-side
outside off, a good length, pushed forward defensively
right up there on the front foot and defended
short ball, cut hard to point now
tight ball on leg, cramping him for room as he tries to pull square
driven hard through the covers, absolutely smashed
on off and defended off the back foot
short ball, defended down off the back foot
short on off and whipped out through the gap to square and they shuffle back well to maximise the runs
pushed forward on the front foot
driven out to mid-off this time
down the wicket and driven out square on the off-side, two would have been ambitious then
driven straight for another single
banged in short and Dhoni pulls off his eyebrows square
brushed off the pads to fine
pitched on off
turned back in on leg and would have gone on down
swept round, beating fine
fires through down off, the ball swinging round then straightening on through
right up there and defended on the front foot
swept round from off to the 45
a good length on leg, defended back down on the front foot
short and splays off the edge through point
clipped off the back foot through backward square, played late and fine
change of pace, and squeezed up outside off, pushed to the covers
punches out to the covers
drums it in a touch short, and is worked off the back foot out to deep cover
driven through the covers for a single
pushed forward on the front foot
turning back in to him, squeezed up on the leg side
full, and guided out to mid-on, there was a chance for Jayasuriya but Dhoni got back in
defended on the back foot into the covers
right up there, defended down into the track
outside off, cut to point off the back foot
short on middle and though he's cramped for room he somehow fashions out a pull behind square
banged in short outside off, cut through the covers
up there and pushed forward
tight in on him on off and pushed forward
slower ball wobbled back in, and driven back out with a thick edge in fact to third man
short ball cut off the back foot to the man at cover who picks it up with ease
outside off and swat-swept back straight through fine
pushed past the left hander who drives back out to the covers to bring up the 200
skews it in on off, good bowling, tucks him up so he plays down off the back foot to the cover
pushed outside off, he waits and whips a firm drive into the covers off the back foot
on leg, turned to midwicket
full on leg and pushed down off the pads to short fine leg
turned off the legs square
the outswinger wide outside off and a big edge goes down safely  to wide third man
short ball, looks for the pull and gets the top edge over the keeper and on its way, an unconventional way to bring up the fifty partnership
defended off the back foot, played to the covers
right up there outside off, played out wide to the deep cover region
up there and defended
driven into the covers and a very loud call
fired there tight on leg, and Jayasuriya has a go from fine leg but doesn't get the direct hit - it wouldn't have been out anyway
played out to the covers
fired past the outside edge from wide of the crease, spinning it away and drawing the batsman into the shot
up there on middle, defended on the front foot
up there, dug out to third man somehow
defended down off the back foot
turned off the legs behind square now
outside off, tight, and sent out to backward point to Kapugedera there
wide down off, left alone
played down outside off from the back foot
a dot to finish, the batsman not finding the correct part of the bat at all and there's a non-knocked-in sound as the ball goes up to the covers
oh, a good ball there, a play and miss to one which is fired down the channel
short ball, pushed on the back foot into the covers
swung across the line there as Amerasinghe came round the wicket and that was an unnecessary shot, the ball pitching on a good length then travelling on to knock back off stump
dragged it down a touch on off and placed into the gap at cover off the back foot
bent on to leg and turned out square
outside off, cut out to point now
a big boomer of a launch over long-off, but is neither out nor boundary-finding, the ball landing safe though
oh, a headrush from Dhoni there as he shapes to cover drive, the ball hopping over the bat
full toss and pat-scooped up and over the vacant mid-on, but two would be suicidal
ah, a wide down leg, can't afford those right now
full and slow on off, the batsman defends over it
short on off, tucked forward to the covers
slower ball outside off, edged, but short of Sangakkara who parries it and they scramble through while he's collecting the ball and himself
good delivery on off, coming back in, and the batsman adjusts a flaying cut to a squeezed out shot down to third man
overpitched on leg and clipped to square
nipped back in from outside off and a touch of rise, the batsman plays back down off the back foot into the covers

outside off, and a well-bowled short ball gets the wicket, the batsman going to hook and the ball's on to him before he's fully played the shot and the top edge goes up and sinks into Jayawardene's hands at first slip
good ball, up there and Harbhajan is tucked up, but his attacking fence sends the ball towards mid-off
oh! An inside edge and at first he looked to have chopped on and they take three as Sangakkara drops it having run back to get it, meaning Harbhajan comes back on strike
a huge yorker booms in on off and Malinga goes up in loud appeal after it swung and hit the pad. Didn't seem to be much wrong with that one in truth
the ball clips the boot and runs on for leg byes and that's about that, three runs needed
zeroes in in line with off, but Harbhajan doughtily gets some bat on it
not much wrong with that one! Malinga spears in his favourite inswinging yorker and raps him low and in the middle, Harbhajan is on his way
outside off, low, and a swish from Ishant with little foot movement gets the ball out towards the gully
Ishant's done his job, keeping another yorker out with a dig of the bat
outside off and Dhoni comes out of his crease, chopping a cut right over the ball and the umpire calls wide to the intense approbation of the team and the crowd
it's all academic now anyway as Dhoni crashes through the covers to bring up his fifty and seal the win for India
